item.title: [video] – TEDxNYED – Dan Meyer presents Impressive Ways to Teach Mathematics
item.description: In the following video Dan Meyer (@ddmeyer) presents an impressive way to teach applied mathematics. I hope that some of our professors will watch this video and keep some of the ideas in mind. [youtube BlvKWEvKSi8] (via e-Learning Blog)
